text: Myristica guadalcanalensis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to the Solomon Islands. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica guadalcanalensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
